column4: i need to share a few drives on a mswindows network.... the ntfs drive went like a breeze... but my 2 fat32 drives have admin only permissions... is there a way to change this ?
I couldn't get my shares to work without a password
come to think of it I couldn't get them to work with a password either
: what bugs me is that the ntfs drive went well.... i am wondering how to change permissions for a whole drive...
